snippet.title: Fantastic Haven - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch the announcement trailer for Fantastic Haven to see the fantasy world, gameplay, and more from this upcoming management game.

In Fantastic Haven, restore the equilibrium of magic by saving endangered fantasy creatures. Build your shelter to welcome and protect them, explore unique regions, rally neighboring populations to your cause, and rehabilitate creatures in their natural environment.

Fantastic Haven will be available on PC in 2024 and coming to consoles at a later date.
